item.title: Senate sets record for longest vote-a-rama as Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' teeters
item.description: Senators worked through the night on amendments to President Donald Trump's "big, beautiful" spending bill. A final vote could come Tuesday.

item.title: Musk shreds Trump's tax bill as 'DEBT SLAVERY,' vows to unseat Republicans who back it
item.description: Musk's latest tirade came as the voting is underway in the Senate on dozens of amendments to the massive Trump-backed tax bill.

item.title: Trump rips AT&T service weeks after Trump Mobile licensing deal announced
item.description: President Donald Trump criticized AT&T two weeks after the Trump Organization announced a wireless mobile licensing deal, Trump Mobile.

item.title: Bush, Obama and a tearful Bono fault Trump’s gutting of USAID on agency’s last day
item.description: Former Presidents Barack Obama and George W. Bush criticized the Trump administration in a Monday farewell video to USAID employees.

item.title: Trump administration probe finds Harvard violated civil rights of Jewish students
item.description: A federal civil rights probe found a "pattern of unlawful and unchecked discrimination" at Harvard.
